comments:
I am getting the following ClassCastExcpetion where an Application root object is not being recognized as a EObject. This blocking our internal product usecase. I am using this S-1.0RC1-200512020059 Rbuild

Hi Vijay - Yes please give me a testcase...   the EMF resource itself is not an EObject...  Thanks...
Hi Chuck, Just sent you an email with the scenario
This turned out to expose a problem with some provider classes that were expecting Notifiers to be EObjects, but can be any "Notifier" which includes Resource....
